sentences.sContent: The morning mail has just been delivered.
They rushed her to hospital where doctors delivered her baby.
sentences.sCn: 他们急速将她送到医院，让医生给她接生。

sentences.sContent: The king delivered a televised speech to the nation on November 5.
sentences.sCn: 国王在11月5日向全国发表了电视讲话。

synos.tran: 交付；发表；递送；释放；给予（打击）；给…接生

words.tran: 可以传送的；可交付使用的

trans.tranCn: 递送；生（小孩儿）；接生；发表（演说等）
trans.tranOther: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person
